comment: Why should Crazy Nancy Pelosi , just because she has a slight majority in the House , be allowed to Impeach the President of the United States ? Got ZERO Republican votes , there was no crime , the call with Ukraine was perfect , with no pressure . She said it must be bipartisan ...
